About Me

I'm an ardent Tech geek who delves into the realm of innovations and his passion for technology made his life goals to apply the usage of Embedded systems, Robotics and Deep learning to improve the healthcare industry. Apart from technology, I love reading non-fiction books related to Physics, Philosophy and Biographies. In my free time, I would like to spend time with online multiplayer games and sightseeing Currently, I'm on the lookout for virtual or remote summer internships that would expand my knowledge boundary.
